casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Gary LAWRENCE. No. 457PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 25, 2005. Thomas C. Maher, for Lawrence. Amy C. Kunstling, Assistant Attorney General, Frank R. Parrish, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th day of April 2005 by Attorney General for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 6th day of June 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 25th day of April 2005."
